title: parameters not registered in module
body_html:
I have a problem when I use dictonaries that contain parameters. Such parameters are not registered in the list of module's parameters.
is there a quick fix for this?

e.g. inside the init of a module:

self.waggrs = {}
self.list_relations={}
for rel in range(10):
 self.waggrs[rel]={'w':nn.Parameter(1.+torch.randn(1, 2)),'b':nn.Parameter(torch.zeros(1, 4))}
 self.list_relations[rel]=nn.Linear(numfeatures, numrel)
